properties.name: storage.s3.default-source
properties.description: Name of the default S3 source used when no source is specified.

properties.name: storage.s3.page-size
properties.description: Maximum number of objects to request per listing page.

properties.name: storage.s3.search-page-limit
properties.description: Maximum number of listing pages to examine when filtering by search query.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.region
properties.description: Region of the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint override for the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.path-style-access
properties.description: Whether to enable path-style access for the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.access-key
properties.description: Access key for the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key for the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.default-bucket
properties.description: Default bucket for the named S3-compatible source.

properties.name: storage.s3.*.display-name
properties.description: Human-friendly display name for the named S3-compatible source.
